name: Spaceside Repairs
description:
Its a simple game prototype so far. Wander through the broken ships. Listen for clues as to where to go. Fix it, and then leave.

Made for Screamsonic 2021

WASD or Arrow keys to move
Mouse to look around
F : toggle flashlight
I : invert Mouse
Space Bar : jump

I am out of time, but after the Jam is over I plan to add additional ships that will have critters and a health mechanic.
